snippet: For the second year in a row, Webster University of St. Louis won the Final Four of chess, although Texas Tech almost pulled an upset.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column says for second year in a row, Webster University of St. Louis wins the Final Four of chess, although Texas Tech almost pulls an upset.
lead_paragraph: For the second year in a row, Webster University of St. Louis won the Final Four of chess, although Texas Tech almost pulled an upset.

headline.print_headline: Webster University Clings to Its Title at Final Four
headline.main: Webster University Clings to Its Title at Final Four
